title: Issues with Upgrading Erigon to 2.56.x (both build and binary)
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: Attempting to upgrade to 2.56.x
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX: Linux

Commit hash: c9216ce10451a235af1cdde572642eac3640fadf, d079008d5901117410e2d471a591748b16720966, a49fcb89fdf98af48fea0c6ee1b2a3666213343f

Erigon Command (with flags/config): 

```
/bin/bash -c '/opt/erigon/bin/erigon \
  --torrent.download.rate=1gb  \
  --datadir=/data/erigon/datadir \
  --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 \
  --private.api.ratelimit=64000 \
  --batchSize=512mb \
  --no-downloader \
  --snapshots=false \
  --chain=goerli \
  --txpool.disable  \
  --metrics \
  --metrics.addr=localhost \
  --metrics.port=6060 \
  --http \
  --http.addr=0.0.0.0 \
  --http.vhosts=* \
  --http.api=web3,erigon,eth,debug,net,trace'
```

Consensus Layer: Using Lighthouse

Consensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

```
/bin/bash -c '/opt/lighthouse/bin/lighthouse beacon_node \
    --datadir="/data/lighthouse" \
    --network="goerli" \
    --execution-jwt="/data/erigon/datadir/jwt.hex" \
    --execution-endpoint="http://127.0.0.1:8551" \
    --http \
    --http-address="0.0.0.0" \
    --http-allow-origin="*" \
    --checkpoint-sync-url="https://goerli.beaconstate.ethstaker.cc" \
    --metrics \
    --metrics-address="0.0.0.0" \
    --metrics-allow-origin="*" \
    --subscribe-all-subnets'
```

Chain/Network: All since it is build issue, binary is for Goerli

#### Expected behaviour

We're trying to upgrade Erigon for the upcoming fork for Goerli.

We can either
1. Build Erigon by pulling source code and runing `make erigon`
2. Download binary and use that

#### Actual behaviour

When building Erigon, we face 

```
...
go: downloading github.com/remyoudompheng/bigfft v0.0.0-20230129092748-24d4a6f8daec
../../erigon-lib/chain/snapcfg/util.go:10:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-snapshot@v1.3.1-0.20240101230756-23fbc6c56a1d: invalid version: unknown revision 23fbc6c56a1d
../../erigon-lib/chain/snapcfg/util.go:11:2: github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-snapshot@v1.3.1-0.20240101230756-23fbc6c56a1d: invalid version: unknown revision 23fbc6c56a1d
make: *** [erigon.cmd] Error 1
```

After downloading the binary, we get a segfault, logs below

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Build issue
1. Pull source code
2. `make erigon`

Binary issue
1. Download binary: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/releases/download/v2.56.2/erigon_2.56.2_linux_arm64.tar.gz
2. Restart Erigon using the new binary

#### Backtrace
Backtrace for segfault (using binary): https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/releases/download/v2.56.2/erigon_2.56.2_linux_arm64.tar.gz
